title: Count Detection
description: Count detection configuration for the rule.

count.description: The number of objects to detect. Mutually exclusive with `numberMin`/`numberMax`. Will be used if `numberOfObjectType` is `definite`.

numberMin.description: The minimum number of objects to detect. Will be used if `numberOfObjectType` is `range`.

numberMax.description: The maximum number of objects to detect. Will be used if `numberOfObjectType` is `range`.

numberOfObjectType.description: Indicates whether the rule should use a max/min range, or a definite number of objects. Value of `range` indicates to use the max/min values.
